original: Bergdahl, Gösta Erik, tf. stadsfiskal, kapten, Borås, f. 3/5/05 i Halmstad av kassör Gustaf B. o. Agnes Bergdahl. G. 45 m. Eva Bartoll. Barn: Robert L 46. — Stud:ex. 24, res:off:ex. 26, jur. kand. 33, polischefskurs 38-39. Kapt. i I. 16 res. 45. Tingstjg. i Nor-da’lis, Sundals o. Valbo doms. samt Linköp. doms., landsfogdeassist. i Gävleb. 1. fr. 39, landsfogdeförordn. i ett flert. län, i Örebro 1. 42-45, tf. stadsfiskal i Borås sed. 46.
translated: Bergdahl, Gösta Erik, temporary city prosecutor, captain, Borås, born May 3, 1905 in Halmstad to treasurer Gustaf B. and Agnes Bergdahl. Married in 1945 to Eva Bartoll, and they had one child, Robert L, born in 1946. Bergdahl graduated from high school in 1924 and from the reserve officer exam in 1926. He obtained his law degree in 1933 and completed police chief training in 1938-1939. He served as a captain in the I. 16 reserve from 1945. He was a court stenographer in Nor-da'lis, Sundals, Valbo and Linköp. He was an assistant bailiff in Gävleb. 1. from 1939 and a bailiff in several counties, and in Örebro from 1942-1945. He became a temporary city prosecutor in Borås from 1946 onward.
